title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a simple CLI & REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (Node & browsers).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM/Chat/Embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI with TUI for interactive model/chat management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama generators & embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda Connectors providing Ollama AI tasks inside BPMN workflows.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscale.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama server & CLI for reproducible deployments.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp vector DB.

title: ollama-node
summary: Community TypeScript wrapper around the Ollama REST API (zero deps).

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI page for ollama-python client (kept in sync with GitHub).

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Hugging Face Space demo running Ollama server for quick browser tests.
